diff_analysis.evidence: The old _quote_re in playhouse/sqlite_ext.py used the pattern '(?:[^\s"]|"(?:\\.|[^"])*")+' which can exhibit catastrophic backtracking on crafted inputs with many quotes and backslashes, leading to a Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS). The new pattern '[^\s"]+|"[^"\\]*(?:\\.[^"\\]*)*"' is structured to avoid such backtracking, indicating the patch mitigates CWE-1333.
